subject: Urgent Response from Sgt. Janet
body:
Good day


I am encouraged that you are willing to assist me and I am very grateful
and thankful for your care.

The details of the transaction


I'm Janet Stone From the USA , I am presently in Syria . I acquired $20
Million USD from the contract I did with the United Nations Oil for food
program here in Syria, now my government is against all such contracts done
by any military officer while serving in Syria and is setting up a panel of
investigation to confiscate funds resulting from all contracts done by any
military officer . I need to know you well and trust you to assist me in
receiving this fund outside Syria which is presently filled in a
consignment in a security and finance company as family treasure.

All arrangements to bring out the consignment from Syria has been concluded
with a United Nations Diplomat. All I want you to do is to receive the fund
since I cannot receive it directly due to my status and duty. I am offering
you 20% of the total sum for your assistance and the remaining will be kept
in a safe place till I come over to you . Your own part of this deal is to
find a safe place where the funds can be sent to.


  I will furnish you with more details. But the whole process is simple and
we must keep a low profile at all times.



However, before we go any further I would like to know more about you. In
order for us to build a trusting business relationship I would like us to
correspond a bit first. I would like to know what you do for a living. Are
you married? Do you have any children? Anything else that you would like to
tell me about yourself would be greatly appreciated.

I believe that in life building a trusting relationship is the most
important thing. If we are able to build this kind of relationship then we
will be able to do business together without any misunderstandings or miss
dealings. In your next mail, please provide me with Your Full Name,
Passport Scan Copy or ID Card, Home or Office Address, Your Occupation,
Your Date of Birth, Your Country of Origin and Contact Phone Number. I will
send you a copy of an agreement That will bind our business relationship
together. I need this personal information to be able to entrust you with
the responsibility of representing my interest. I donâ€™t  have access to the
phone here due to security reasons and we are all monitored by the US
Government.

I look forward to hearing from you soon. Thanks for your understanding.

Regard,

Sgt. Janet Stone.

subject: Re: Urgent Response from Sgt. Janet
body:
Hello Sgt. Janet Stone,

It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance! Your story is quite intriguing, and I must say it sounds like you're in quite a predicament over there in Syria. It's fascinating to hear about your involvement with the United Nations Oil for food program.

I'm curious, how did you manage to secure such a contract? And why is your government against these contracts? It seems like they would be beneficial for everyone involved.

As for me, well, I lead a simple life. I don't do anything particularly exciting for a living. Just the usual 9-5 grind, you know? As for family, well, that's a bit of a sensitive topic. Let's just say it's complicated.

I'm afraid I can't provide the personal information you requested though. You see, I've been advised not to share such details online due to security reasons. But rest assured, I am very interested in hearing more about your situation and how I might be able to assist.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Debra

subject: Project
body:
Hi

How are you doing today? Hope all is well with you.
I want you to know that I have completely made up my heart to entrust all
funds under your care, note that I packaged all funds inside a locked boxes
before depositing it with Expert Diplomatic Company in Turkey, for
safekeeping and when depositing the box I registered the content of the
boxes as family valuable treasure items for security of the funds inside
the boxes ,no staff of the delivery company knows the real content as money.


Thank you so much for the information my good friend, I cannot wait to meet
you if I am still alive when this transaction is concluded. I want to
clarify one doubt from you that this transaction is 100% legal. I
understand you may be skeptical but please you must really have to help me
secure the money and in case anything happens to me here in the war zone,
then I advise you to distribute my share of the fund to the charity homes
for their continuous prayer upon my life. I would also like you to build a
hospital for the poor which will be in my name as well.

I will proceed immediately to prepare the delivery of the boxes to you as
my rightful partner for handing over our boxes to you on my behalf, then
the diplomat will make the delivery to you as diplomatic luggage so this
allows free entry inside your country without screening at the airports. My
dear, I would have loved to call you for more discussions but we are not
using personal mobile phones and all the telephones we have here are
available operators that monitor incoming and outgoing calls , so I will
not like to communicate with you on it for now because I want our
transaction to be confidential.

Have in mind that I have made up my mind to give you 20% of the fund for
your assistance and support in this deal. I really understand what it takes
to accumulate such huge amount of funds under your care, for this reason, I
am willing to share it equal as I am not a greedy person and hence my dad
and mom are dead and am the only child.so as it stands right now you
represent my prospect partner because this deal is what we do together but
please make sure that my share is well secured until I complete my service
here and come over to meet with you.

Know that I am free with you because I have trusted you with all my heart
in this deal. So please do not let me down. You may not understand why I am
doing this but I know even if I passed away, your prayer and the prayer of
the orphanage will secure me a place in paradise.

And remember they don't know the content of the safe boxes except me and
you. It's a top secret.


Here is the Delivery Company Details to contact them now

ATLANTIC DIPLOMATIC COMPANY TURKEY
Address : Embassy Diplomatic Section
Email : Atlanticdiplomatic@diplomats.com
Website : www.atlanticsecuritycompany.com
Operational Manager : Mr. Robert Belto

subject: Re: Project
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. I must say, your story is quite intriguing and it's clear that you're going through a lot right now. I appreciate your trust in me.

I'm curious about the process of transferring these funds. How does it work exactly? And how did you manage to secure such a large amount in locked boxes?

Also, could you tell me more about the Expert Diplomatic Company in Turkey? What kind of services do they provide and how reliable are they?

I'm also interested in knowing more about the charity homes you mentioned. Which ones are they and what kind of work do they do?

Please understand that I'm just trying to get a clearer picture of everything. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Debra

subject: Project
body:

I need a good partner who I can trust to assist me in receiving the
consignment on my behalf.

since I cannot receive it directly due to my status. I acquired $20 Million

skeptical but please you must really have to help me secure the money and
in case anything happens to me here in the war zone, then I advise you to
distribute my share of the fund to the charity homes for their continuous
prayer upon my life. I would also like you to build a hospital for the poor
which will be in my name as well. So contact the delivery company now and
ask them delivery procedure of the safe boxes to you

subject: Re: Project
body:
Hello there,

Wow, your story is quite intriguing! It's not every day that I get to hear about such exciting adventures. I'm really interested in learning more about your experiences in Syria and the oil business you were involved in. 

You mentioned a United Nations Diplomat, could you tell me more about how they are involved? And what exactly is this "United Nations Oil for food program"? It sounds like a very important initiative.

Also, I'm curious about the security and finance company where the funds are currently held. Could you provide more details on that?

I must say, your plan to distribute funds to charity homes and build a hospital for the poor is truly commendable. It's great to see people thinking of others even in difficult times.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Debra

subject: Project
body:
I have explained everything to you and you keep repeating the same
questions or are you joking with me because this is no joke, please be
serious.

subject: Re: Project
body:

Best wishes,
Debra

subject: Re: Project
body:
Hello there,

Wow, your story is quite intriguing! It sounds like you've been through a lot. I'm curious about the oil business you did in Syria. How did you get involved in such a venture? And how did you manage to secure such a large sum of money from it?

I'm also interested in knowing more about this United Nations Diplomat who helped you conclude all the arrangements to bring out the funds from Syria. Can you tell me more about him or her?

You mentioned that your government is against contracts done by any military officer while serving in Syria. Why is that? And what kind of panel are they setting up?

It's very noble of you to want to distribute your share of the fund to charity homes and build a hospital for the poor. What inspired this decision?

Lastly, could you provide more details about this delivery company? How do they operate and ensure the safe delivery of such valuable items?

Looking forward to hearing more about your fascinating story!

Best wishes,
Debra
